title: Wisdom
description:
Swagu and Perk have an open conversation about mental health in sports including their own struggles coming to terms with the end of their playing careers. Plus, the truth about leadership in a locker room and why quarterbacks and point guards aren't always the guy like the media wants you to believe. And are the Rams the team to beat in the NFL or do the Cowboys have something to say about it? Let's get it.
